cards
Class Card

java.lang.Object
  cards.Card

public class Card
extends java.lang.Object

Card is a class for representing a playing card used in such games as Solitaire, Freecell and Blackjack. Card has two attributes: its rank (int) and its suit (String). Card also has methods for checking whether it has a red/black suit, whether a given Card equals this Card, as well as methods for whether this Card is the predecessor/successor of another given Card.

For convenience, a static method Card.allCards() is also provided.

Author:
Richard Douglas
